rComments: I hated this class because I didn't know what to write my paper on, the assignments were vague and I personally didn't like Sheilah, so that ruined it for me.

Best teacher ever at SC. She even managed to get Elliot Aaronson as a guest speaker. Very helpful. Knows her stuff and knows how to teach. Everything is straightforward and organized. At first I thought the tests were too easy. In retrospect, it was because she taught so well. They were still ez though, no gimmicks or tricks. 1 APA paper @ end.

Dr. Siegel is a great instuctor!  This was one of my favorite courses at UCSC.  She brought very interesting real life examples to class.  She has a great sense of humor, but did expect a lot from us.

Instructor was well organized and very enthusiastic about the subject matter.  She really wanted to get her students involved.  Had a tendency to talk to the class like children but she was consistently kind. Did not offer a study guide for exams.  Final exam asked students to evaluate their own traumatic experience(TOTALLY INNAPROPRIATE! but nice)

OMY GOSH! freakn great class.. Amazaing instructor! dude! she's hella good and hella intereesting...the subject is awesome and the overall course in not hard...somewhat a lot of reading ,but if u get the lectures...u probably can skip most of the readings! she's great ...I recommend her... fosho!

Sheila's class is insanely interesting.  She captures your attention very well.  The guest lecturers she chooses are awesome.  However, you do have to do all of the reading, and its not just a tiny bit either. I would say its worth it because you learn so much in the course.  Must attend all lectures and complete all readings + research paper.
